data.name: TribeXR - Lodato Lounge Environment
data.detailed_description: The Lodato Lounge is a lush nightclub environment hovering above a neo-futuristic skyscape. Once you get it, you'll be DJing in a neon themed room where you can invite your friends for back-to-back sessions and dance parties.
data.about_the_game: The Lodato Lounge is a lush nightclub environment hovering above a neo-futuristic skyscape. Once you get it, you'll be DJing in a neon themed room where you can invite your friends for back-to-back sessions and dance parties.
data.short_description: The Lodato Lounge is a lush nightclub environment hovering above a neo-futuristic skyscape. Once you get it, you'll be DJing in a neon themed room where you can invite your friends for back-to-back sessions and dance parties.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
